this is the worst game i have ever played and its so sad that valorant didn't come out before it. Millions of cheaters, retarded cheat developers and shit ranking systems. The game should also be renamed the CS:Russia because more than 101% of your playerbase is mentaly unstable russian niggers

The game in itself is very good, and the community has made a ton of fun mini-games to play aswell if u get bored of playing the real game. the only problem with this game is that its hard for new players to get into.

MM (especially non-prime) has a bunch of cheater issues and toxic player issues. but if u have friends to play with this game can be very fun and addicting.

I recommend it

The free-to-play Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is arguably one of the most iconic FPS titles of its generation. The new Panorama UI drastically improves its interface, but the gameplay can sometimes feel repetitive. Counter-Strike Global Offensive is a model that every FPS game made after it has tried to get closer in some way. So if you are afraid CSGO is a dead game, don't worry: they are still plenty of terrorists and counter-terrorists playing the game. And if u looking for a FPS game this is it!!
